Plot: An inept karate instructor struggles with marital troubles and an unhealthy obsession with fellow karate enthusiast Chuck "The Truck" Wallace.
Title: The Foot Fist Way
Writer: Ben Best, Jody Hill, Danny McBride
Actors: Danny McBride, Mary Jane Bostic, Ben Best, Spencer Moreno
tomatoConsensus: The rough edges and biting humor of this martial arts comedy will keep audiences laughing and cringing in turns.
